clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text: FamilyTreeDNA uses some third parties to show you FamilyTreeDNA-related advertisements that are personalized to you based upon your online behaviors or interests.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: This service tracks you on other websites
clauses.description: The service may use tracking technologies in third-party websites to track your online activity while you aren't visiting their Site.
clauses.clause_text: We may show you an advertisement when you leave our site because we think you might be interested in FamilyTreeDNA.

case.text: This service tracks you on other websites

clauses.title: Your DNA samples may be shared with law enforcement agencies
clauses.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.

case.text: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you

clauses.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: We also utilize advertising cookies, beacons, pixels and/or tags to aid us in marketing our services and products to interested individuals.

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: Your content can be licensed to third parties
clauses.description: By posting content through the Services, users grant them a transferable and/or sublicensable right, which allows user content to be licensed to third parties.
clauses.clause_text: Also, by submitting User Provided Content through any of the Services, you grant FamilyTreeDNA a sublicensable

case.text: Your content can be licensed to third parties

clauses.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
clauses.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.
clauses.clause_text: "using your information in a manner consistent with other commitments in this Privacy Statement to: [...] Offer new products or services to users through emails and promotions"

case.text: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

clauses.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
clauses.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.
clauses.clause_text: This may include how you access our Services, including the website you visited before landing on FamilyTreeDNA, your exit page

case.text: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

clauses.title: The service may keep a secure record of your data for analytical purposes even after the data retention period
clauses.description: The data retention period states how long a service keeps user data. In this case, the service may anonymize the personal data after its retention period is over and use it for analytical or research purposes.
clauses.clause_text: We will store your sample for at least twenty-five (25) years unless you request otherwise.

case.text: The service may keep a secure, anonymized record of your data for analytical purposes even after the data retention period

clauses.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text: As a result, these partner companies will have some of your information in their systems.

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
clauses.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.
clauses.clause_text: You agree that any DNA sample you submit and all resulting data may be transferred and/or processed outside the country you reside.

case.text: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

clauses.title: The service promises to inform and/or notify you regarding government inquiries that may involve your personal data
clauses.description: In case the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they will make reasonable efforts to inform/notify the user (e.g. warrant canary).
clauses.clause_text: If compelled to disclose your Personal Information to law enforcement, we will do our best, unless prohibited by law, to provide you with notice.

case.text: The service promises to inform and/or notify you regarding government inquiries that may involve your personal data

clauses.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.
clauses.clause_text: How does FamilyTreeDNA use your information

case.text: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

clauses.title: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text:
The types of Information FamilyTreeDNA collects <ol>
<li>

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations
clauses.description: The Third Parties accessing your personal information must keep it confidential and only use it for limited purposes.
clauses.clause_text: Our partners act only at the direction of FamilyTreeDNA and are subject to contractual obligations governing data security and confidentiality consistent with this Privacy Statement and applicable laws.

case.text: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text: You may stop using the Services at any time.

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: Your content can be distributed through any media known now or in the future
clauses.clause_text: license to host, store, copy, publish, distribute, provide access to, create derivative works of, and otherwise use such User Provided Content to the extent and in the form or context we consider suitable on or through any media or medium and with any technology or devices currently known or hereafter discovered or developed

case.text: Your content can be distributed through any media known now or in the future

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.
clauses.clause_text: Within the limits allowed by applicable laws, you expressly acknowledge and agree that FamilyTreeDNA shall not be liable for any indirect, direct, incidental, consequential, special, or exemplary damages, including but not limited to, damages for goodwill, loss of profits, use, data or other intangible losses (even if FamilyTreeDNA has been informed of the possibility of such damages), resulting from: (a) the use or the lack of ability to use the services. (b) any action you take based on the information you receive as a result of the services. (c) the cost of procurement of substitute goods and services resulting from any goods, information, data, or services obtained or purchased or transactions entered into through or from the services or messages received. (d) your failure to keep your password or account details secure and confidential. (e) the improper authorization for the services by someone claiming such authority. (f) unauthorized access to or alteration of your transmissions or data. or (g) statements or behavior of any third party on the services, including use of the Services by law enforcement officials or on their behalf.

case.text: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

clauses.title: Your content can be deleted if you violate the terms
clauses.description: Content infringing the Terms of Service (or the Acceptable Use Policy or equivalent) may be removed, with or without notice.
clauses.clause_text: We reserve the right, but are not required, to remove or disable access to any User Provided Content that we believe violates these TOS.

case.text: Your content can be deleted if you violate the terms

clauses.title: They may stop providing the service at any time
clauses.description: They may discontinue the services without prior notice, at any time, for any or no reason. They usually assume no liability for losses and damages resulting from this suspension.
clauses.clause_text: FamilyTreeDNA reserves the right at any time to modify or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, the Services (or any part of the Services) with or without notice.

case.text: They may stop providing the service at any time

clauses.title: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to use the service for chain letters, junk mail, spamming or any other distribution of content to people who have not agreed to receiving it.
clauses.clause_text: (viii) post or make available any advertising, promotional materials, spam, junk mail, chain letters, or any other form of solicitation.

case.text: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

clauses.title: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
clauses.description: This service prohibits users from submitting content of a variety of types. This can include content that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, threatening, libelous, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, or discriminatory in any other way.
clauses.clause_text: Additionally, you agree not to use the Services to: (i) post or share any content that is illegal, threatening, harmful,

case.text: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

clauses.title: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to post any content of pornographic nature. This includes adult content, things that are sexually explicit, or obscene.
clauses.clause_text: otherwise objectionable, including content or communications that are degrading, defamatory, vulgar, hateful, libelous, fraudulent, obscene, pornographic

case.text: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
clauses.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.
clauses.clause_text: FAMILYTREEDNA DOES NOT MAKE ANY PROMISES (A) ABOUT THE SPECIFIC FUNCTIONALITY OF THE SERVICES, (B) ABOUT THE FAMILYTREEDNA CONTENT, (C) ABOUT THE ACCURACY, QUALITY, RELIABILITY, OR AVAILABILITY OF THE FAMILYTREEDNA CONTENT OR SERVICES

case.text: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

clauses.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.
clauses.clause_text: You are responsible for all activity and usage on the Services made via your account.

case.text: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

clauses.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service
clauses.clause_text: Service Providers: We use the services of other companies to help us provide the Services to you.

case.text: Third parties are involved in operating the service

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in Texas
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction (specified in the title of each point by replacing the "X").
clauses.clause_text: This Agreement and any dispute regarding the Services shall be governed by the laws of the State of Texas, USA,

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in location X

clauses.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
clauses.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.
clauses.clause_text:
Do Not Track Disclosure

FamilyTreeDNA notes that although we do our best to honor your privacy preferences and have put into action industry standard safeguards as explained above, at this time, we do not respond to Do Not Track signals from your browser due to the lack of an established industry standard.

case.text: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
